category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence learns continental hydrology"
excerpt: "Changes to water masses which are stored on the continents can be detected with the help of satellites. The data sets on the Earth's gravitational field which are required for this, stem from the GRACE and GRACE-FO satellite missions."
